about_the_game:
Lost In Bardo
Demo version 2.0.13 (6 Jul 20017)

In this demo there is only first chapter.


Hints:
-To change the screen resolution hold the Shift Key(Alt Key on Mac version) and launch the game.

FAQ! I’m STUCK:
The fact that there is no pepper in the kitchen now is the way it should be. Try to look for pepper elsewhere.

What’s new:

  • New Fonts
  • More sounds
  • More puzzles
  • More dialogs and side dialogs
  • Added dynamic lightning
  • Improved inventory
  • Improved camera
  • Pixel Perfect
  • Professional translation and editing
  • Bug fixed
